header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Pirates, eating, Shakespeare week, going to Stratford, circus workshop in a real circus, Easter pictures, magic, stop motion animation
header.activity: Family talking about pirates, Shakespeare and the circus

body.u: okay I w I would like to talk about pirates and what would you do if you were one or like you were captain of the ship
I think if you were a prisoner on a pirate ship you'd probably do all their chores
you would probably have to walk the plank at sometime
but what if you were the actual pirate though?
oh if you were an actual pirate you'd er have to go to bed very early because pirates are actually quite civilised people by themselves although once they meet another ship they're very very hostile
but you're right we saw that on Horrible Histories that they had a an early curfew didn't they?
and lots of rules to live by what would your pirate name be ?
mm that would depend if I was a captain or not
cos if I was a captain I would have a really cool name
okay if I was captain I'd be called shark
and if I was a normal pirate

and if I was a normal pirate I'd be something like Dagger
okay I think I would be Red-Handed
if I was a normal pirate and
yes the villain that's in our book erm
mum you don't have purple hair there
purple hair wasn't invented back then
I could dye my hair with erm blueberries

cos I'm sure I would have nasty scars all over my face
what if I was your daughter?
what if I was your daughter?
then we'd all be pirates together wouldn't we?

well that depends er if you were rude to me in front of my crew
then I would c just say
I might lock you up for a bit
then I would say mama and I would cry and then you'd have to give me my teddy bear
and then you would need to have to get me out

no like if you had the child on land
at least the child would never get seasick cos they'd be on the ship their entire life
I know but you don't want a child seeing piratey things do you?
it could be a it could be it could be a pirate child?
yes I know but it's it would be very dangerous for them wouldn't it? unless they had a good hiding space what if their ship what if their parents got killed and their ship got set fire to?
I know but then they would be a spy for another crew
well no they'd probably die on the ship wouldn't they?
no they wouldn't they'd go into the ocean they'd find their dad tell him that their mum has died and be with him
so they'd somehow swim the ocean?
well they could make friends with a shark
because babies are very very clever
what sort of adventures would we get up to?
I didn't kn I still don't know why pirates want treasure
or to er or just for the fun of getting it
yeah just the fun of it it'd be nice to have lots of jewels and necklaces and things wouldn't it?
although if your ship did get raided
then er you would've given em all your gold
but darling that's why they used to bury their treasure on islands so that ththat wouldn't happen so they could return to the get the treasure later
cos their ship wouldn't hold much more
obviously it was very tricky if you forgot which island you'd left it on or lost your map or anything like that
would we be nice to other people? or would we just kill everybody?
we could be nice pirates do you know what nice pirates do?
they don't kill people they shoot their leg
well you could still die from that but yes ?
yeah we could be nice pirates
and we just like we'd we'd be friends with

don't have to whisper what is it?
alright well don't eat it then
and can I have er please have a dessert?

so what are you planning on having now?
you can have some grapes or something like that

then we could just quit our job

find out what he actually looked like

and when I've read back to the in er

if he was a really nice person I think he was cos he did

it would be nice to go to the grave

I guess so I don't know if if I wasn't doing the circus myself I don't know if I would need to stay with you or anything I probably would anyway but erm and I don't know how many children will turn up but it's very nice of the circus people to let us all come and have a look and it's perfect that we didn't go the other day cos we can have a look at it see it from the inside go home and have lunch and come back and then actually watch the show
so that'll be rather good won't it?
we'll have to just ignore the clowns
except Pierrot or Pierrot clowns you know the black and white sad clowns?
but no I don't like I don't like clowns in the circus but everything else I like and we I was meaning to have you found all three of your juggling balls yet ?
erm well I only need two

oh but it'd be nice if you found the other one I would like to lear start learning how to juggle I reckon if I can sort doing a handstand out then I shall aim to do juggling we could learn that together and you know what you should do tomorrow as as well? you should go on your bike again to give it another go to keep practising we forgot to ask to lower your seat and raise your seat so whenever we see him next we need to ask him to do that okay?
